root.title: Old Turkic Writing on a bronze mirror found in Aktobe, The
root.place: The mirror was found in nomadic ancient barrow ("The Barrow III") on coast of the river Elek near Aktobe city of West Kazakhstan oblast.
root.store: The mirror is stored in Central State museum of Republic of Kazakhstan. KP N22425.
root.general: Қола айнаның жиегiнде дөңгелене үшкiр темiр затпен 1 жол мәтін жазылған.
root.description: 1 line of the writing is carved round by sharp iron subject on edge of the bronze mirror. There are 11 signs in the line.
root.size: The circle length of the mirror is 17.1 cm and thickness is 0.2-0.3 cm.
root.investigation: Castanet 470 announced about bronze mirror in 1906 for the first time. A.S.Amanzholov 471 conducted researches of the writing.
root.details: Н.Базылхан "Көне түрік бітіктастары мен ескерткіштері (Орхон, Ениесей, Талас)" //"Қазақстан тарихы түркі тілді деректемелерде" атты сериясы бойынша. II том. - Алматы: Дайк-пресс, 2005. - Б.242.
